name: Full 24/7 Human Support & Sale
author: FULL.DO

sections.description:
Full Customer Support – Full Time – Full Coverage.
You can\’t be in all places at once – but we can be there for you! Get FULL Coverage – Give your customers the FULL experience they deserve

Bringing Back the Human Touch to eCommerce
Convenience and selection are king and queen of online retail – yet we\’re missing a major piece of the puzzle – the human touch.

FULL Support – The future of Experiential eCommerce
FULL is a decentralized, virtual sales and support force for eCommerce. With one simple widget, transform ANY eCommerce store into a personalized shopping experience, seamlessly and continuously.

Full Experience – End to End
Connect to System: We connect to your store\’s back end to your store\’s back end – giving us full access to inventory and all information about products and orders.
Connect to Customer: When a new customer enters the site – FULL immediately identifies language and location, connecting them to the right rep for a fully-personalized, real time experience.
Connect the Dots: Our reps are trained to answer questions, help with returns, change orders, check inventory, make recommendations and increase conversion rates, cart size and repeat business exponentially.
Full Support Human Widget – The Future of Doing is Here
Sticking to your budget with no limits on hours and types of support. Even as you sleep, rest assured, your business is in good hands. – No Commitment. – No Minimum period.

Get Started with Our unique Widget application!
sections.installation:
1. Install this plugin from the directory or by downloading it directly from here and uploading it.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Go to ‘Full.do support widget’ tab on the left sidebar of your WP admin panel,
    and click on ‘Complete registration’ button for rediract the plugin’s site to register.
  4. Go to price and plans and choose plan.
  5. To activate our service so we can receive the calls of your business, add a new
    hotline and set the required settings
  6. At the end of the settings you will be asked to select a phone number for the service,
    This number can be advertised to your customers
  7. The service is activated, you can make voice calls from your site
